projects.title: Butyrate mediated regulation of gene expression
projects.description: To evaluate effect of Butyrate on Proliferation and Apoptosis of epithelial cells, we performed an RNA Seq analysis through Affymetrix.Identified RNA binding protein (RBPs) genes, during inflammatory gene expression, and as a result, we got downregulation in post-transcriptional regulation after treatment with Sodium-Butyrate.for the analysis, we prepared Count matrix, normalized data of up and downregulated genes, and Heat Maps.

projects.title: Analysis of inflammatory signals in Toxoplasma infected PHT cells
projects.description: To appraise the response of innate and adaptive Immune to T.gondii infection (a major source of congenital disease worldwide, such as toxoplasmosis), performed RNA Sequencing of samples of the human genome, using GEOquery in Python.Prepared a count-matrix from that, and to remove uncertain values the normalization tests were performed on the count data.Constructed the sheet of up and downregulated genes, at P-value 0.05, and plotted Heat Maps to quantify them.

projects.title: Course Project: The building of the homology model for homologous proteins coded by SARS-CoV-2
projects.description: Determination of the Proteins that are coded by the SARS-CoV-2 genome, and the prediction of their functions were carried out.For the verification of the properties of these proteins, the identification of best homologous protein sequences were performed.For those proteins who show structures in Protein Data Bank (PDB), the Homology models were constructed.

projects.title: Application of Piperine for the Treatment of Cancer
projects.description: To appraise therapeutic potential and Cytotoxicity of Piperine in mouse, Glioblastoma Cells C6 was reviewed, and performed MTT assay.The cytotoxic effect of Piperine in both time and dose dependent manner on the C6 cells was assessed through IC50 value.The size and morphology were observed under a Bright field phase-contrast microscope, and Western blot was performed for expressions.The work showed the concealed therapeutic potential of Piperine in the direction of cancer treatment
